api_list.name: Search for a chord by entering notes or midi keys (v2)
api_list.description: The response is an object with a 'result' property, holding an array of chord object(s), or an empty array when no match was found. Only exact matches are returned.

api_list.name: Chord defined by root and name (v2)
api_list.description: The response is an object with a 'result' property, holding an array with one chord object.

api_list.name: All chords for a certain name (v2)
api_list.description: The response is an object with a 'result' property, holding an array of all chords with the specified name.

api_list.name: All chords for a certain name
api_list.description:
v1: Returns an object with all chords for a certain name
v2: Returns an object with an array of all chords for a certain name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://piano-chords.p.rapidapi.com/chords/major"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "piano-chords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://piano-chords.p.rapidapi.com/chords/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "piano-chords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All chords for a certain root
api_list.description:
v1: Returns an object with all chords for a certain root
v2: Returns an object with an array of all chords for a certain root

api_list.name: All chords
api_list.description: Returns the full list of available chords

api_list.name: Chord defined by root and name
api_list.description:
v1: The response is a chord object with name, an array of notes, an array of intervals and an array of midi keys
v2: The response's result property is an array holding the specified chord object
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://piano-chords.p.rapidapi.com/chords/e/maj7"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "piano-chords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://piano-chords.p.rapidapi.com/chords/{root}/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "piano-chords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search for a chord by entering notes or midi keys
api_list.description: Returns an array of chord objects (when a match is found)

api_list.name: All chords for a certain root (v2)
api_list.description: The response is an object, with a 'result' property, holding an array of all chord objects for the specified root note.

api_list.name: All chords (v2)
api_list.description: The response is an object with a 'result' property, holding an array of all available chord objects.
api_list.code:

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
